attributes.description:
5 Year / 150 000 Km Warranty & 5 Year / 60 000 Km Service Plan. 1 Million Km Or 10 Year Engine Warranty! 

Features:
ADAS,
Dual front Airbags,
Front Side Airbags,
Curtain Airbags, 
ISOFIX, 
ABS,
Electronic Brakeforce Distribution,
Emergency Brake Assist,
ESP,
Traction Control System,
Roll Stability Control,
Electric Power Steering,
EPB+Autohold,
Hill Assist & Downhill Assist,
Tyre Pressure Monitoring System,
360° Panoramic Camera,
Keyless Entry and Push Button Start,
Carlock & Remote Window Close, 
Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirror, 
Electric Folding Exterior Mirror,
Driver seatbelt pre-tensioner,
Front passenger seatbelt pretensioner,
Front passenger seatbelts reminder,
LDW(Lane departure warning),
BSD(Blind Spot Detection),
FCW(Front collision warning),
Automatic brake system,
Rear Cross Traffic Alert,
IHC(Intelligent High beam control),
Lane Change Assist,
Speed Sensitive Electric Power Steering, 
Multi-function Steering Wheel with 4-way Adjustments,
Electronic Parking Brake,
Driving Modes (Standard, Eco, Sports),
Dynamic Adjustable Steering Modes (Eco, Sport),
Cruise Control,
Adaptive Cruise Control,
215/60 R17 Alloy Wheels,
Power Sunroof,
Red Brake Callipers, 
Roof Rails,
Auto Speed Adjust Front Wipers, 
Automatic Headlights, 
7-inch colour TFT Cluster,
Front 12V, 
Bluetooth Handsfree,
10.25-inch Multimedia Touch Display, 
Intelligent Voice Control, 
Apple CarPlay/Android Auto, 
Six Speakers,

Pop your Chery in the new ALL-NEW Tiggo 4 Pro with Intelligent Voice Assistance, Intelligent Climate Control, and a host of other cutting-edge features. The SUV that commands attention everywhere you go! This new Chery in Elite specification will leave you speechless with its excellent fuel efficiency, class-leading interior build, and jaw-dropping Warranty!

Nationwide Delivery.
T&C's Apply.
E & OE
